title: Take a look around
text:
::: column width=“30%” 

::: column width=“70%” ### Francesco Rosadini Welcome! This is the prototype of my new website always in progress. In this website you can know more about me, about what I consider my job and what I love to do. I am a Master’s student in biology currently writing my thesis at the Max Planck Institute of Animal Behavior. I am investigating behavioral adaptation of the common shrew associated with environmental and physical shifts. ::: :::
::: :::
